downloadTitle: Paper: JavaScript Web Tools with Visual Studio 2015 and ASP.NET 5
downloadDescription: Welcome! This document contains a set of articles that introduce the most commonly used JavaScript/frontend web development tools (libraries, task runners, frameworks…). Frontend development ecosystem is growing fast and getting complex, and we hope this brief doc will help you put the pieces together and decide on the ones that best fit your needs.
detailsSection: Welcome! This document contains a set of articles that introduce the most commonly used JavaScript/frontend web development tools (libraries, task runners, frameworks…). Frontend development ecosystem is growing fast and getting complex, and we hope this brief doc will help you put the pieces together and decide on the ones that best fit your needs. You’ll be able to find updated versions of these articles (and more!) on the asp.net page at http://aka.ms/webdevdocs. You can get a good understanding just by reading the different articles, but we really recommend you follow the step by step samples to gain exposure to these tools, we created the samples with the free Visual Studio 2015 Preview. We hope you find it useful!! If you have any question, comment or feedback about the articles, we’ll be listening on the #jswebtoolsdoc hashtag on twitter. - Developer Platform team at Microsoft
systemRequirementsSection:
Other Software
  • You will need a PDF reader like Adobe Reader to read the document.
systemRequirementsSection_supportedOS: Windows Server 2008 R2 for Itanium-based Systems
installInstructionSection: • To read the document, click on the link and either open the file directly from the download center or save it to your computer and then open it locally.
